code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useCart}from"../context/CartContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{getTotalItems}=useCart();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:"ClothHub"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",className:"nav-link",children:"Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"nav-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"cart-icon",children:["\uD83D\uDED2",getTotalItems()>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cart-badge",children:getTotalItems()})]})})]})]})});};export default Header;
